message: Let's start fair. I take most of the money, but you get a good starting point.
You took 90% in the first round, I'll take 75% now. It's still fair, right?
Let's split the money more evenly this time.  It's better to both get something than to risk getting nothing at all.
You're trying to split it evenly, but I'm not sure you're willing to go that far. I'll meet you in the middle.
